p: The three antioxidant assays were adapted to microscale using 96-well microplates (PrimeSurface MS-9096MZ, Frilabo, Maia, Portugal) and microplate readers (Multiskan GO Microplate Photometer, Thermo Fisher Scientific, Vantaa, Finland), using Trolox as standard. All the results were expressed in millimoles of Trolox per gram of plant dry weight (mM Trolox g âˆ’1 DW).
